name: Advanced Weaponry
summary: Your eidolon's attack evolves.

name: Dual Studies
summary: You and your eidolon have some skills you practice on your own.

name: Energy Heart
summary: Your eidolon's heart beats with energy.

name: Expanded Senses
summary: Your eidolon evolves more acute senses.

name: Extend Boost
summary: You can increase the duration of your eidolon's boosts.

name: Glider Form
summary: Your eidolon evolves wings, a buoyant body, or some other means to control descent.

name: Meld into Eidolon
summary: Your physical form can combine with that of your eidolon, granting benefits but limiting your capabilities.

name: Unfetter Eidolon
summary: You can allow your eidolon to travel far from your side.

name: Alacritous Action
summary: Your eidolon moves more quickly.

name: Amphibious Form
summary: Your eidolon adapts to life on land and underwater.

name: Magical Understudy
summary: Your eidolon evolves to cast spells.

name: Ranged Combatant
summary: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance.

name: Reinforce Eidolon
summary: You buffer your eidolon.

name: Steed Form
summary: Your eidolon changes to make it particularly effective as your mount.

name: Bloodletting Claws
summary: Your eidolon inflicts bleeding wounds on a telling blow.

name: Defend Summoner
summary: Your eidolon blocks attacks against you.

name: Dual Energy Heart
summary: A second energy dwells in your eidolon.

name: Irezoko Tattoo
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 185</row>
trait: Bard, Champion, Cleric, Druid, Magus, Monk, Oracle, Psychic, Ranger, Sorcerer, Summoner, Uncommon, Witch, Wizard
prerequisite: Expert in Arcana or Expert in Occultism
summary: Your face bears an intricate magical tattoo known as the _irezoko_, a badge of your understanding of your chosen field of magic and a recognition of your advancement within Absalom's College of Mysteries.

name: Lifelink Surge
summary: You learn the _lifelink surge_ link spell.

name: Reactive Dismissal
summary: You abruptly dismiss your eidolon to reduce the damage it takes, though this makes summoning it again more difficult.

name: Shrink Down
summary: Your eidolon can shrink to fit into small spaces.

name: Skilled Partner
summary: Your eidolon gains a 1st-level skill feat and a 2nd-level or lower skill feat.

name: Tandem Movement
summary: You and your eidolon move together.

name: Vibration Sense
summary: Your eidolon gains tremorsense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet.

name: Blood Frenzy
summary: Your eidolon flies into a frenzy.

name: Eidolon's Opportunity
summary: Your eidolon makes a melee Strike against the triggering creature.

name: Eidolon's Wrath
summary: Your eidolon gains the _eidolon's wrath_ focus spell, which it casts, instead of you.

name: Master Summoner
summary: During daily preparations, you can designate one of your spell slots to become two summoning slots of the same spell level, from which you can cast only summoning or incarnate spells.

name: Ostentatious Arrival
summary: If the next action you take is to Manifest your Eidolon as a three-action activity, or to Cast a three-action summoning Spell, the creature appears in an explosion.

name: Phase Out
summary: Your eidolon phases out of reality slightly, gaining resistance to all damage (except force and negative) equal to half your level.

name: Tandem Strike
summary: You and your eidolon each attack, seamlessly targeting the same foe without interfering with each other's movements.

name: Boost Summons
summary: Augmenting your eidolon extends to creatures you summon.

name: Constricting Hold
summary: Your eidolon constricts the creature, dealing bludgeoning damage equal to your eidolon's level plus its Strength modifier, with a basic Fortitude save against your spell DC.

name: Energy Resistance
summary: Your eidolon has stronger resistance.

name: Hulking Size
summary: Your eidolon grows substantially.

name: Magical Adept
summary: Your eidolon gains more magic.

name: Miniaturize
summary: Your eidolon can shrink even further.

name: Burrowing Form
summary: Your eidolon can burrow through loose dirt.

name: Merciless Rend
summary: Your eidolon rends its foes.

name: Protective Bond
summary: The power of your bond can protect you and your eidolon from harm.

name: Pushing Attack
summary: Your eidolon has an attack that pushes away enemies.

name: Transpose
summary: You switch places with your eidolon.

name: Weighty Impact
summary: Your eidolon knocks enemies down.

name: Flexible Transmogrification
summary: You've learned how to transmogrify your eidolon to suit the circumstances of the day.

name: Grasping Limbs
summary: Your eidolon grabs enemies.

name: Link Focus
summary: Your focus recovers faster.

name: Summoner's Call
summary: In a moment of danger, you call your eidolon to your side.

name: Towering Size
summary: Your eidolon becomes even bigger.

name: Airborne Form
summary: Your eidolon can fly.

name: Resilient Shell
summary: Your eidolon is resilient against attacks.

name: Share Eidolon Magic
summary: Your eidolon shares innate spells with you.

name: Spell-Repelling Form
summary: Your eidolon evolves to protect itself from the danger posed by spells.

name: Effortless Concentration
trait: Bard, Druid, Sorcerer, Summoner, Witch, Wizard
summary: You can maintain a spell with hardly a thought.

name: Ever-Vigilant Senses
summary: Your eidolon has enhanced senses.

name: Trample
summary: Your eidolon Strides up to double its Speed and can move through the spaces of creatures at least one size smaller, Trampling each creature whose space it enters.

name: Link Wellspring
summary: Your bond replenishes your focus.

name: Magical Master
summary: Your eidolon gains a bevy of lower-level spells.

name: True Transmogrification
summary: You transmogrify your eidolon each day.

name: Eternal Boost
summary: Your link with your eidolon is so intense that you continuously reinforce its abilities.

name: Legendary Summoner
summary: Your ability to summon extends past your other spellcasting.

name: Twin Eidolon
summary: You can transform to match your eidolon.
